text: I have just visited Sheng Siong at Aljunied n there is a male staff guiding customer to go to counter to do payment , his attitude n his tone is very rude towards me. When I using the machine I need to press at the screen n he n one of the staff guide me but also using sarcastic remarks towards me.  What kind of customer services is that? Both of them behind me laughing at me as I using the machine.  They thought I donâ€™t understand what they talking ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡

You can find my fav Sheng Siong outlet and it is one of the putlets which you could redeem Oximeter. During peak period best bet is to park in the multi-storey carpark. The open air car park near the newly renovated can be very packed. You find several good furniture shops run by moms and pops.
Huge Sheng Siong available with seafood & meat counter, friendly staffs. 2 durian stalls at the back, & a Teafolia stall at the side.

It is a shopping plaza with supermarkets and shops.all materials such as furniture,clothes and all household materials and shoes available.there are also restaurants and bakkeries that make yummy and tasty food.There is also variety of  fruits and vegetable shops.
Great credit should go to Sheng Siong Supermarket for making this matured yet unexciting building lively again, especially during the night.
